posts.post_content:
Well, time to clean out a few more cards and make room for some new things. Here is my updated trade list of almost all HOFers. I am looking for:

* Pre-War HOFers (any type, any grade)
* 1948-1968 HOF RC's
* Lou Gehrig, Babe Ruth, Mickey Mantle, Ted Williams any

Go ahead and shoot me a list of what you have available. I can send scans of most of my cards as well. Just put a few below as samples.
